action.action-desc: Mr. Bost (for himself, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, and Mr. McKinley) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of rare earth minerals originating from Taliban-controlled Afghanistan in United States sold and manufactured components.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Profits for Taliban-Controlled Mines Act.

section.header: Prohibition on use of rare earth minerals originating from Taliban-controlled Afghanistan in United States sold and manufactured components
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the President shall take such actions as may be necessary and appropriate to prohibit the use of rare earth minerals originating from Taliban-controlled Afghanistan in United States sold and manufactured components.
